title: Frame Scaling by Graphs
authors: Ayyanar K, P. Sam Johnson and A. Senthil Thilak
abstract:
In this paper, we investigate the scalability of a given frame in
$\mathbb{R}^n$ by using graphs. For each frame $\phi$ in $\mathbb{R}^n$, we
associate a simple undirected graph $G(\phi)$ and use it to verify the
scalability of $\phi$. We provide some necessary conditions to test the
scalability of a given frame. Finally, we study the scalability of some special
classes of frames by using graphs.
